text: You are hailed as a national hero of Dermond, many see you as an enemy but there is almost nobody that will try to challenge your Authority, except for The Goverment, and The Military Council.

Many see you as just a normal soldier, but there is good speak of you in the mids of most Dermondians. You mostly know a lot about the military traditions, and many high ranking officers would surely want to employ not only because of your skill but also because of your political weight.

Most people don't know how, or when Dermond became happy to see you in their space. You surely have either paid them a lot, or you just don't act like an asshole. That is mostly what Dermond wants, to not be treated like shit.

Many question how you got so good with Dermond, and many will try to execute you, but who will try to kill you, is not for you or me to decide. Dermond will surely be happy to be allies with you, as they do need your help...
Dermond does not see you anymore as a hostile entity. Most Dermond patrools will still stop you, but they won't try to be as harsh with you as before.
Dermond does not hate everybody, but they do see a lot of faction as hostiles. It's for you to decide do you want them to be dissapointed in you, or you use your brain and not be an asshole.
You are being monitered, and some agent is being tasked with tracking you. If you try to be much hostile with them you can either save your skin or become an asshole.
Dermond fleets are allowed to engage you at any moment, most people would still rather not deal with you. But they can attack you if they want to.
